page.title: 16A day in the life of Geoff
page.content: My dad Geoff Longrigg, farms at Mere Bank, Bleatarn. His dad and brother are farmers too. He wakes up at about 6.00 a.m. and gets in the cows for milking. After milking he has his breakfast at about 9.00. He usually has a cooked breakfast of egg and bacon. After breakfast he mucks out the byre and often spreads the muck and slurry on to the field before having his bait - sandwiches and coffee. Depending on the time of year he then goes silaging or haytiming or hedging. My dad is a birdwatcher and tries to make the hedges better for birds to live in. On Tuesdays he goes to the auction at Penrith.He has his tea when we come home from school then sees to the sheep and calves. He has supper at 6.30 p.m., and if there's time, goes bird watching.
